alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 5:54PM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... ...BLOWING DUST WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock and Red Willow Counties. In Colorado, Yuma County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ this evening. For the Blowing Dust Warning, until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High winds are continuing to produce blowing dust which is reducing the visibility down to three to five miles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
